title: Ananadat-tEn
sahitya:
Anandat-tEn uNNuvOm vArIr aruL maNam paraviDum aravinda malarilE


anupallavi

  mOnattilE turiya vAnattilE OmkAra gAnattilE vigjnAttilE surakkum


caraNam    allalaip-pOkkiDum amaidi uNDAkkiDum accattai nIkkiDum amara sanjIvi adu
tollulagilE pudu yugattinait-tulakkiDum shuddha sutantara shakti aLIkkum param-
